Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 56th overall pick, by Boston in 1970...
Injured on 6/8/1971 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/21/1975, off Joe Decker (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1977, off Ron Tompkins (CHW)...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 8/8/1979...
Injured on 9/29/1979 with a Broken Ulna, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1980, hitting .579 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/1/1980 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Injured on 10/3/1985 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/26/1986 with a Strained Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
